edu.ucla.sspace.index
Class RandomIndexVectorGenerator

java.lang.Object
  edu.ucla.sspace.index.RandomIndexVectorGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
IntegerVectorGenerator<TernaryVector>, Generator<TernaryVector>, Serializable
public class RandomIndexVectorGenerator
extends Object
implements IntegerVectorGenerator<TernaryVector>, Serializable

An class that generates RandomTernaryVector instances based on configurable properties. This class supports two properties:

Property: "edu.ucla.sspace.index.RandomIndexVectorGenerator.values"
Default: 4
This variable sets the number of bits to set in an index vector.

Property: "edu.ucla.sspace.index.RandomIndexVectorGenerator.variance"
Default: 0
This variable sets the variance in the number of bits to set in an index vector. For example, having "edu.ucla.sspace.index.RandomIndexVectorGenerator.values"=4 and setting this property to 2 would mean that 4 &plusmn; 2 value would be randomly set in each index vector.

See Also:
